summary: This header file defines interfaces for buffered file operations in Sendmail, including functions for opening, committing, rewinding, truncating, closing, and testing buffered files. It also defines flags for the sm_io_setinfo() function specific to the SendmailBufferedFile type.

logs.reason: This string serves as an identifier for the buffered file type in Sendmail and might appear in logs when operations related to buffered files are performed or when errors occur.
logs.resolution: This is an identifier rather than an actual log message. If it appears in error logs, look for issues with buffered file operations in the Sendmail system.
